typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		DatasetTableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromQuery
source(output(
		FilePath as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		DatasetTableName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TableFromView
TableFromQuery derive(Dataset = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[1],
		Name = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[2]) ~> SplitTFQ
TableFromView derive(Name = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[2],
		Dataset = split(DatasetTableName, '.')[1]) ~> SplitTFV
SplitTFQ, SplitTFV union(byName: true)~> CombineData
CombineData aggregate(groupBy(Dataset,
		Name),
	each(match(name!='Dataset'&&name!='Name'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctData
DistinctData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertTables
UpsertTables sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TestSinkTables.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Dataset,
		Name,
		FilePath,
		LineNumber,
		DatasetTableName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TestResult
